messages.subject: Breastfeeding Now Considered Pornographic
messages.messageBody:
http://www.kuro5hin.org/story/2003/4/19/23560/3126


<http://www.kuro5hin.org/print/2003/4/19/23560/3126> [P]
<http://www.kuro5hin.org/story/2003/4/19/23560/3126> Breastfeeding Now
Considered Pornographic (MLP <http://www.kuro5hin.org/section/mlp> )
<http://www.kuro5hin.org/images/clear.gif>
By Eloquence <http://www.kuro5hin.org/user/Eloquence>
Sun Apr 20th, 2003 at 01:22:24 PM EST

<http://www.kuro5hin.org/images/clear.gif>
America - land of the free. And to guarantee that freedom, everyone has
to be constantly watchful. Like the photo store clerk from Eckerd
<http://www2.eckerd.com/content.asp?content=ephoto%2Fdefault> who
dutifully reported a Peruvian-born couple's lewd shots of their infants
to the Richardson (Dallas/Texas suburbs) police. The photos showed the
parents' two infants bathing naked, lying together in bed with their
mother (again naked) and the 1-year-old Rodrigo suckling his mother's
(naked) breast. So the couple was arrested -- the maximum prison
sentence for the crime in question being 20 years -- and the children
taken away. Thomas Korosec has the details in his Dallas
<http://dallasobserver.com/issues/2003-04-17/feature2.html/print.html>
Observer article.

Can you believe this?



Angela



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
